content.heading: <svg> Tag
paragraphs: The <svg> tag defines a container for SVG graphics.

Example: <svg width="100" height="100">
  <circle cx="50" cy="50" r="40" stroke="green" stroke-width="4" fill="yellow" />
</svg>

content.heading: Definition and Usage
paragraphs: Supports drawing paths, shapes, and text.

content.heading: Browser Support
paragraphs: Supported since Chrome 4, Edge 9, Firefox 3, Safari 3.2, Opera 10.1.
